pages.text: The $(item)Fuel Processor$() breaks down Furnace fuels into $(item)Fuel Pellets$(), each burning for a single item in a Furnace. They can also be combined into groups of 4, 16 or 64 for convenience. The output amount is rounded down if needed (for example with planks). $(br2)Items can be inserted/extracted from any side except top and bottom.
